templates.title: Eufy Security WS
templates.name: eufy-security-ws
templates.description: eufy-security-ws is a small server wrapper around the eufy-security-client library to access it via a WebSocket. It allows you to control Eufy security devices by connecting to the Eufy cloud servers and local/remote stations.

env.name: null
env.label: null
env.description: Label of the trusted devices (viewable with 2fa activated in Eufy App; default: random device name)
